mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM devops_service ds, devops_app_service da WHERE ds.app_service_id = da.id AND ds.`name` = #{name} AND da.project_id = #{projectId} AND ds.env_id = #{envId} AND ds.`status` != 'deleted'

SELECT ds.id, ds.`name`, ds.ports FROM devops_service ds WHERE ds.`status` = 'running'
AND ds.env_id = #{envId}

SELECT ds.id, ds.`name`, ds.external_ip, ds.labels, da.project_id appServiceProjectId, ds. ports, ds.end_points, ds.`status`, ds.`type`, da.id AS app_service_id, da.`name` AS app_service_name, de.id AS env_id, de.`name` AS env_name, dsai.instance_id AS instance_id, dai.`status` AS instance_status, ds.last_update_date, ds.creation_date, ds.created_by, de.code AS env_code, (SELECT detail.message FROM devops_env_resource resource LEFT JOIN devops_env_resource_detail detail ON resource.resource_detail_id = detail.id WHERE resource.kind = 'Service' AND resource.name = ds.name AND env_id = resource.env_id ) AS message, dai.code AS ins_code, (SELECT count(1) FROM devops_env_pod dp WHERE dp.app_instance_id = dai.id) pod_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM devops_env_pod dp WHERE dp.app_instance_id = dai.id AND dp.`status` = 'Running' AND dp.is_ready = TRUE) pod_running_count, dai.last_update_date AS ins_last_update_date, dai.object_version_number AS ins_object_version_number, dai.status AS ins_status FROM devops_service ds INNER JOIN devops_env de ON ds.env_id = de.id LEFT JOIN devops_service_instance dsai ON dsai.service_id = ds.id LEFT JOIN devops_app_service_instance dai ON dai.id = dsai.instance_id LEFT JOIN devops_app_service da ON da.id = dai.app_service_id WHERE ds.id = #{id} AND ds.`status` != 'deleted'
SELECT DISTINCT env_id FROM devops_service WHERE `status` = 'running';
